attributes.review: Once downloaded this app took all my data and erased it. Also it hack my phone leading me to get a new phone and phone number. Don’t download this app

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Gave my phone a virus after days of trying to download it had to buy a new phone...

attributes.title: I can’t believe this app exists!
attributes.review: This app really just stole all my data and took advantage of me constantly asking for donations.... I have no more money. so stop asking

attributes.title: This app killed my cat
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, my cat fell off my bed and landed on his neck, causing it to break. This app is not worth it anymore. If I can’t have my poor baby Mr. Fluffers, trump can’t get a good rating. 😤

attributes.title: The worst app ever!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the app had a bunch of glitches and the notifications were messed up. Do not get this app!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP! ⚠️🧚‍♀️🧜‍♀️✨🥴
attributes.review: this app destroyed my life! i wish i could give it 0 stars! it loads slowly, took forever to download and is upright horrible! you all should learn a thing or to from tiktok 😍.

attributes.title: Horrible! 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽😩😩
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever seen! Don’t use it! It can track you and doesn’t even work! If you download it you will regret it very soon!

attributes.title: Preposterous
attributes.review: This app took forever to download once it finally did I opened the app and it told me as a woman I have no freedom and if trump is elected I will be put back in the kitchen to be pregnant, barefoot and obedient stop this bigotry

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It took 8 hours to download and when I went down stairs every tv in my house was playing a trump campaign

attributes.title: This app
attributes.review: This app was so slow it took hours and hours to download and when I opened it it was the trashiest presidential campaign ever I’m going to delete it
